name: Clothes
description: An outfit woven from thick, sturdy thread

name: Leather armour
description: Warrior's clothes made from tanned animal skins.

name: Chain mail
description: Made from interlocking loops of sturdy steel.

name: Iron armour
description: Armour favored by the knights of Tantegel.

name: Full plate armour
description: A peerlessly protective suit of armour.

name: Leather shield
description: A light shield of simple construction.

name: Iron shield
description: A large, sturdy shield of solid iron.

name: Silver Shield
description: A shield made of purest beaten silver.

name: Bamboo lance
description: A long spear made of bamboo.

name: Oaken Club
description: A weapon hewn from a stout log.

name: Iron Axe
description: Can fell feebler foes with a single swing.

name: Steel Sword
description: Slices through enemies like a knife through butter.

name: Flame Sword
description: Useful in battle, and not only when wielded...

name: Dragon's scale
description: A talisman carved from the scale of a dragon.

name: Fairy water
description: It is used to avoid random encounters

name: Torch
description: Lights up the darkness of dungeons.
